about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience delivering high-performance web, mobile applications. Expert in React, React Native, TypeScript, and Node.js, with a strong background in both front-end, back-end ecosystems. Don't mind contributing into QA, DevOps things, usually setting them up for my personal projects at least.
about.paragraph2: Proficient across diverse domains: streaming platforms, fintech, foodtech, blockchain, rich mapping functionality, influencer marketing, and e-commerce. I combine technical expertise with adaptability, having worked in startups or enterprises, from foodtech to fintech. I used to be a lead developer or a team lead depending on the target. Having strong abilities to pick things up quickly, troubleshoot, and deliver value in complex environments.
about.paragraph3: I would believe that I'm the one who easily gets new people, projects - being cheerful and proactive. I'm not that concerned about the legacy code, damned project etc. Over the years I have come to think more from the business perspective, not being that idealistic but instead really being passionate about bringing the target value, moving forward and developing myself, surrounding colleagues, business.
